prompts: Create an ice-type Pokemon with a snowy appearance and large branches for arms.
Imagine a Pokemon that thrives in cold climates and has a furry white body.
Generate an ice and grass-type monster resembling a winter tree.
Make a Pokemon with a playful nature and unique winter-themed design.
Show me a creature that embodies both forest and snowy mountain vibes.
Give me an example of a gentle giant Pokemon that looks like a snowy hill.
Design a Pokemon with icy features and bushy foliage, perfect for mountain terrains.

distinctive_features: A body resembling a snow-covered evergreen tree
